sentences.sContent: After all, among the "stressors" cited by one participant was "awkwardness re: who should pay at a restaurant.
sentences.sContent_eng: After all, among the "stressors" cited by one participant was "awkwardness re: who should pay at a restaurant.
sentences.sCn: 毕竟，这些”强压人群“被另一个参与者引用为”尴尬者：谁应该为吃饭付钱。

sentences.sContent: It got me thinking that everyone must have awkward pictures and we decided to set up a website to share them as a sort of celebration of awkwardness.
sentences.sContent_eng: It got me thinking that everyone must have awkward pictures and we decided to set up a website to share them as a sort of celebration of awkwardness.
sentences.sCn: 那让我想，每个人都会有一些出糗笨拙的相片，我们就决定设立一个网站去分享它们，（以此）作为一种对尴尬的庆祝。

sentences.sContent: Not feeling you should share some of the stressors in your life (‘Yeah, wouldn’t I like to have your problems’), awkwardness re: who should pay at a restaurant.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not feeling you should share some of the stressors in your life (‘Yeah, wouldn’t I like to have your problems’), awkwardness re: who should pay at a restaurant.
sentences.sCn: 感觉不到你可以在生活中跟别人诉说烦恼（对，因为我不会有你这样的麻烦啊。） ，尴尬的是：在餐馆吃饭谁付呢。

words.tran: 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的
